title: Uber Is Now Testing “Suggested Pickup Points”
description: Uber is going to tell you where you should get picked up. A few days after I wrote a story recommending that Uber launch a feature called “Suggested Pickup Location”, I’ve spotted the company testing a feature called “Suggested Pickup Points” in San Francisco. [Update: Uber confirms this feature began testing yesterday, telling me “Our product team is… Read More
